## Import Data

```{r}
library(tidyquant)

getSymbols('AAPL')

from <- today() - years(1)
IBM <-  tq_get('IBM', get = 'stock.prices', from = from)
AAPL <- tq_get('AAPL', get = 'stock.prices', from = from)

head(IBM)
head(AAPL)
```
